title: Reminder that  Morgana's dark binding hit box is Bul!sh!t

embed.description: This is an accurate representation of all morgana players. if you enjoyed it, leave a like or comment! Follow me on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Gary1q2 Outro song: An air horn christmas

replies.body:
That's really all Morg needs is the visual fixed to match the hit box.
Then people will realize it's actually a living entity that reaches out and grabs you no matter where you run.
Actually looks like a cute cuddly version of {{champion:161}} ...

Except this one inserts evil tendrils into your every squishy orifice.

I post this after seeing janna getting her Howling Gales hit box nerfed for not matching the visuals.

And Nidalee getting a change much like this a while back.

jannas Q sometimes completely does zero damage/knock up to targets it hits.
Because riot cant code for shit.
That happens with all skillshots,even had this happen to me with tibbers.

Yeah, I believe this has happened to me sometimes too.

>jannas Q sometimes completely does zero damage/knock up to targets it hits.

I think for the damage part, maybe have it charge longer?
IDK, I've usually just let it charge all the way for majority of the times I've used it, but that might just be me.

> [{quoted}](name=Mordecai7562,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=H1m2kUdH,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-12T14:35:42.267+0000)
>
> Yeah, I believe this has happened to me sometimes too.
> 
> I think for the damage part, maybe have it charge longer?
> IDK, I've usually just let it charge all the way for majority of the times I've used it, but that might just be me.

The point is skillshots just often simply do nothing,generally i have a few instances per day when my q->e combo on syndra just goes straight through people doing nothing,and I mean just right through them.
If you want to replace one of them they would probably be happy just be ready to recieve death threats, and possibly cry yourself to sleep about having to use very outdated tech.
LOL, noob that is what happens when you have lag..... that was NOT the hitbox, that is was a player being massively lagged and how the league engine handles it.

That seems more like a huge chuck of lag than hit box.

PS: the hit box on minions is real.
Says the noob keyboard user... " that is was a " lol :P
Ping probably played a large role int this, Never in any game as morg have i hit a snare that far off.
Cant deny that the hitbox is ridiculous tho.
You sure it just wasn't lag?
LOL Veigar was all "Let it goooooooooo"
Considering I've had Bindings whiff and miss by far less than that margin..seems to me this was lag or other forces at work.
There are a few hitboxes that need to be fixed, {{champion:7}}s chain and {{champion:36}}s  cleaver just off the top of my head

The cleaver's hitbox was narrowed and fixed a couple of patches ago

Edit: 4.2 to be exact
must have missed the patch notes, glad they fixed it, laning vs mundo was pretty annoying when you would get hit with things you visually dodged

{{champion:32}}  Q needs to be fixed too, can't quite count the many times I q'd right next to them and still landed the bandage toss.

http://youtu.be/FAa2m5NUy5Q?t=40s

I should have recorded the vayne game I just played.  I was q'ing away from the bindings, but still getting hit by them...Even the enemy team was like "seriously this is bs".  And my ping is 28, so its not like i am lagging or anything.

> [{quoted}](name=ylneveaH evoL,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=H1m2kUdH,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-01-12T18:12:50.061+0000)
>
> I should have recorded the vayne game I just played.  I was q'ing away from the bindings, but still getting hit by them...Even the enemy team was like "seriously this is bs".  And my ping is 28, so its not like i am lagging or anything.

please take a video because your "i was dodging them but they hit me" sounds like the normal BS whines lol. same for your ping, which is most likely not accruate as i highly doubt you are looking at your ping while you dodge, or maybe that is why you fail dodged :P. That said there is sooo much more to ping and riots silly ping meter is very crude and most likely  left crude on purpose to cover up their poor network performance. what really matters is your over all data transmission or packets...you can drop packets, have small spikes etc that will create some really wonky stuff.

you have to understand the engine has to decide between what your client says and all the other players. I have had some really wild stuff visually occur on my screen when my inet was acting up.  

Anyrate you can argue her q is a little large it also moves incredibly slow for a skill shot in league of gap closers so while her Q might be BS to a true skillful champ like MF who actually has to position and dodge to avoid it, for a champ like vayne it is a joke you ever eat a morg Q when you can just tumble away from every skill shot in the game, like many champs in this now incredibly imbalanced and horribly design game (really the champ kits they ruined their own game).

Vayne's Q hitbox is just as poorly labeled as Morgana's Q hitbox

It's as if when Vayne tumbles, her hitbox doesn't move as quickly as her animation or something, so oftentimes Morgana can snare Vayne by hitting where Vayne was before her tumble started

Honestly I don't understand why Riot refuses to put in unit circles, or at least have them as an option we can toggle. It'd fix these hitbox issues once and for all.
I wish they fixed all the screwed hitboxes. I love playing as Lux when it looks like the laser hits but it actually doesn't or the other way around. Like what.
I dunno... Being a morgana player, that looked pretty legit to me.
Braum too, and especially blitz thats some jacked up curry dawg.

Braum's, however (note: I don't play Braum), requires the ADC to follow up with some AA to have the passive go off. If you use the Q to poke, people can easily just walk away.
Not the same with Blitz, tho, he can easily just 1v2 the bot lane if he wanted to...
Maybe? :I

> [{quoted}](name=Mordecai7562,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=H1m2kUdH,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-01-12T14:38:12.244+0000)
>
> Braum's, however (note: I don't play Braum), requires the ADC to follow up with some AA to have the passive go off. If you use the Q to poke, people can easily just walk away.
> Not the same with Blitz, tho, he can easily just 1v2 the bot lane if he wanted to...
> Maybe? :I

all they need to do for blitz is fix his hitbox and reduce his damage a smidge.
well... TAhm KenchÂ´s Q(lick) is WORSE MUCH MUCH WORSE THAN HER Q
MY BROTHER IS SLEEPING THE ROOM OVER I CANNOT LAUGH AND IT'S KILLING ME!!!!
Her hitbox is big as her tits{{champion:25}} {{champion:10}}
I wish we could bump things... cuz this should be bumped every day.
And don't get me started on TF's 3 cards. That hit hox confuses me so much since it looks like I got hit and it doesn't hit and the nit looks like it missed and it hits.

I find Nidalee's spear has a similar issue. I played versus one the other day and the spear would pass my body but the end of the spear would seem to deal dmg. So it appeared to have been dodged, then, nope.
Are you playing in Bronze solo Q?
Seems legit to me.

Man, no wonder I can't seem to dodge it. :)

Speaking of lag/glitches, I was playing Quinn recently and vaulted right through Ahri's charm and then killed her. It felt so right.
Jannas hitbox is way worse.
Upvoted for Airhorn Christmas.
It's photoshop.
lol
Lol
Oh please, this is so ridiculous. this never actually happens in the game.
It really does happen...seen it as ww a few times.
nerf morgana
Making it thinner would make it better in lane because thinner skillshot=less creep block. Make it hit more reliably but last fewer seconds and I'd be much happier than making it thinner.
